message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant savings compared to its market value of $15,000. I am confident this investment will prove highly beneficial for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
